title: Getting Started Step 2: Budget Your Money

content.html: You have your goals but that is just a dream unless you start budgeting and the first rule of budgeting is make it practical.

If you already have a budget for the previous month, We make it easy for you to copy your previous month's budget into the current month. New to BlitzBudget? Not an issue, Click the add button in the bottom left to automatically add a new budget.

To Be Budgeted

Ensure that the To Be Budgeted is always a 0. You could use the full potential of budgeting by adding the relevant budget.
